thread.title: Oscars 2017: See all of this year’s nominated films in one supercut
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: See all of this year’s nominated films in one supercut

author: Devan Coggan
title: Oscars 2017: See all of this year’s nominated films in one supercut
text:
Email 
We’re less than a month away from this year’s Academy Award ceremony, so if your goal is to see all the nominated films before the awards are handed out, you’d better get cracking. If you’re pressed for time, however, Cineplex is here with a handy supercut that edits together all 47 of this year’s feature film nominees. 
The video may run just 2 minutes and 30 seconds, but it includes everything from the blockbuster best picture nominees (like Arrival and Moonlight ) to the lesser-known categories. La La Land is well-represented, of course, having scored a record-tying 14 nominations, but so are smaller films with just a single nomination, like the gorgeous animated nominee The Red Turtle or the Swedish-language film A Man Called Ove. 
Watch the supercut above, and see the full list of this year’s nominees here . Show Full Article
